page.title: 11MUTHILL, COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: The Community Council has seven members elected for a period of three years. The Chairman is Mr S. Macintosh, Secretary Mrs Arburthnott, Treasurer Mr N. Aiton. The Council meet in the school once a month. Their aims are to improve the village. The Council pass on complaints to the District Council about broken pavements, faulty street lamps etc. The Coronation Park has been dug up, drained and re-seeded, seats and games equipment have been put in. Â£6000 was raised to do this work. They provide trophies for football,badminton, golf, bowling and darts. They run night classes in Art and Dress-making, and run a yearly Garden Competition. In July every year they run a Gala Week.Other members are T. Sweeney,A. Fotheringham,A Lang, Mr Dawson,( who represents Tullibardine).
